name: Kobashi
overview: Game presented in the MRC "Under Water" Challenge. The goal in KOBASHI is survival. To survive means that you have to eat as much food as possible. But beware, the food will not drop if you stick at the surface, or if you stop moving. The game ends when your powerbar is depleated. Computer players will also die when their power is depleated, but they will regain their life after a few seconds.
